channel.title: Player Spawned
channel.description:
[b]Player spawned some rares, luckily nobody was online for these to be distributed, How do I fix this? I have an old 317 PI server, I'm currently only using a Webclient, No client.
Help and a how to fix, would be greatly appreciated.[/b]

item.title: Player Spawned
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:3, topic:520004”][quote author=tgm clan link=topic=638497.msg4303975#msg4303975 date=1369463762]
goto commands and make the rights to ==3
[/quote]
I’d be surprised if that was the problem (though it is ofcourse a possibility). Probably used a cheat client (or cheat engine) to change packet data to give him the items he wanted. You can expect alot of these things to happen when using a PI-source.[/quote]
I’ve used cheat engine since before it was cool Really good for testing bugs in my server too lol. But for that just made a new client :D, can spam it with rapid packets, and see if anything fookey happens. i could bug test yours but im writing my own server from scratch ._. too much crap is in current ones, this is only way to get a clean one (its like 3rd time i have started a server from scratch, but i got it logging in walking and doing commands so i am happy)

Read full topic

item.title: Player Spawned
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

tgm clan:

goto commands and make the rights to ==3

I’d be surprised if that was the problem (though it is ofcourse a possibility). Probably used a cheat client (or cheat engine) to change packet data to give him the items he wanted. You can expect alot of these things to happen when using a PI-source.
